com.seatunity.boardingpass.utilty
Class BoardingPassApplication

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Application
              com.seatunity.boardingpass.utilty.BoardingPassApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class BoardingPassApplication
extends android.app.Application

This class extends the Application class. It contains a static reference to the application context & a private SharedPreferences object to read & write to the default shared-preference of the application.
